translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: It sure is quiet now that everyone's gone.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It sure is quiet now that everyone's gone.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Feeling lonely, are we?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Feeling lonely, are we?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Yeah. I miss chatting with everyone before bedtime.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Yeah. I miss chatting with everyone before bedtime.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No point thinking about it now. Go to sleep.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No point thinking about it now. Go to sleep.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I really liked having everyone with us, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I really liked having everyone with us, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Why the long face, Octa?{LF}Late for your nightly measuring ceremony?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why the long face, Octa?{LF}Late for your nightly measuring ceremony?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ah, yes...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ah, yes...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I tell you, it is really quite strange...{#Name="Octa"}
source: I tell you, it is really quite strange...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: The little scamp won't rise for me tonight.{LF}Not a single twitch!{#Name="Octa"}
source: The little scamp won't rise for me tonight.{LF}Not a single twitch!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: That's unusual.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's unusual.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So much for the great Octa's illustrious career, eh?{LF}Oh ho ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}
source: So much for the great Octa's illustrious career, eh?{LF}Oh ho ho ho!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And just when I had your exclusive attentions, too.{LF}Such a shame...{#Name="Octa"}
source: And just when I had your exclusive attentions, too.{LF}Such a shame...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Let's get going.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Let's get going.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My lady, if I may...{#Name="Octa"}
source: My lady, if I may...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I think the time has come for you to tell me{LF}about your flower.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I think the time has come for you to tell me{LF}about your flower.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Forgive me, my lady. Have I overstepped my bounds?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Forgive me, my lady. Have I overstepped my bounds?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: No. I suppose it's about time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No. I suppose it's about time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It all started two years ago...{#Name="Zero"}
source: It all started two years ago...{#Name="Zero"}
